author: Al Jazeera
title: Coronavirus: These US states refuse to issue stay-at-home orders
description: The lack of action - even as they close schools and limit the size of gatherings - has frustrated some health experts.
content:
Even as most Americans are under orders from their governor to stay at home to slow the spread of the coronavirus, leaders in a handful of states have steadfastly refused to take that action, arguing it is unneeded and could be harmful.
